document.full_text: an argentine commercial plane crashed in the country's remote patagonian region late on wednesday, killing all 19 passengers and three crew members on board, the director of a local hospital told reporters.
document.title: plane crashes in argentina, 22 dead: hospital
lines_and_colors: an argentine commercial plane crashed in the country's remote patagonian region late on wednesday, killing all 19 passengers and three crew members on board, the director of a local hospital told reporters.
